meta.description: Why is there so little unity in churches regarding COVID-19? Why are seemingly mature Christians taking such widely divergent viewpoints on all things related to COVID-19, whether it be masks, vaccines, and/or social distancing? How can churches achieve and maintain biblical unity when there are disagreements on important issues?

title: Church Disunity & COVID-19 - A Pastoral Roundtable - Podcast Episode 62
